command.upload.clipboard.title: Upload image from clipboard
command.upload.explorer.title: Upload image from explorer
command.upload.inputBox.title: Upload image from inputBox
config.title: PicGo
config.configPath.description: The path to your PicGo-Core configuration. PicGo will use `#picgo.picBed#` if this is not specified.
config.dataPath.description: The path to your data file, including all uploaded images' info. PicGo will use `your_home_dir/vs-picgo-data.json` if this is not specified.
config.customUploadName.description:
Customize the name of the image to be uploaded, image will be renamed before uploading.
- `${fileName}`: the name of the original image, without extension name.
 **Notice: If you selected some text before uploading, the selection will become the `fileName` of the image to be uploaded.**
- `${extName}`: the extension name of the original image.
- `${mdFileName}`: the name of the current editing markdown file.
- `${date}`: YY-MM-DD formatted date.
- `${dateTime}`: YY-MM-DD-hh-mm-ss formatted date.

Examples:
- `${fileName}-${date}` -> `picName-2016-07-25.jpg`
- `${mdFileName}`-`${dateTime}` -> `markdownName-2017-04-12-222810.jpg`
config.customOutputFormat.description: Customize the output format of the uploaded image. - `${url}`: the url of the uploaded image. - `${uploadedName}`: the name of the uploaded image, see `#picgo.customUploadName#`. Examples: - `![${uploadedName}](${url})` -> `![picName-2016-07-25](https://example.com/xxx.jpg)` - `` -> ``
